tuv.seg: ## Basic animation
## 简单动画

* Use previous values and increment it: ```BABYLON.Animation.ANIMATIONLOOPMODE_RELATIVE``` * Restart from initial value: ```BABYLON.Animation.ANIMATIONLOOPMODE_CYCLE``` * Keep their final value: ```BABYLON.Animation.ANIMATIONLOOPMODE_CONSTANT```
* 使用之前的值然后递增： ```BABYLON.Animation.ANIMATIONLOOPMODE_RELATIVE``` * 从初始值重启 ```BABYLON.Animation.ANIMATIONLOOPMODE_CYCLE``` * 保持最后的值: ```BABYLON.Animation.ANIMATIONLOOPMODE_CONSTANT```
**Parameter 1** - Name of this animation, nothing more.
**参数1** - 动画的名称，仅此而已。
**Parameter 2** - The property concerned.
**参数 2** - 关心的属性。
**Parameter 3** - Frames per second requested: highest FPS possible in this animation.
**参数 3** - 请求的每秒帧数：这个动画里最大 的FPS。
**Parameter 4** - Type of change.
**参数 4** - 修改的类型。

**Parameter 5** - Finally, you have to decide and enter the type of behavior this animation will take at its upper limit (e.g. will it continue on, will it begin again, will it stop at the last key value, etc.):
**参数 5** - 最后, 你需要决定并输入这个动画的行为类型，这些会决定动画的受限(比如:当到最后一帧时是否继续，是否重新开始，或者停止)：
**Parameters for scene.beginAnimation:**
**提供给scene.beginAnimation的参数：**
//At the animation key 0, the value of scaling is "1"
//在动画0键，放在倍数是 1。
//At the animation key 100, the value of scaling is "1"
//在动画的第100键，放大倍数是1。
//At the animation key 20, the value of scaling is "0.2"
//在动画的第20键，放大倍数是0.2。
//Create a box
//创建盒子
//Here... your basic scene as before: [scene, light, camera]
//这儿... 作为开头的基础场景元素[scene,light,camera]
An Animation is defined by various properties and a collection of keys.
一个动画是由许多属性和一系列的键值定义的。
Animations --- # Animation Your scene is beginning to look great, but it is very static.
动画 --- # 动画 你的场景开始看起来很棒了，但它仍然是呆板且静态。
Every key represents the value of the Animation at that key's given time.
每个键值代表了动画片段在那个时刻的值。
Exact values are:
具体的值会是：
Finally, you can launch your animation in one line of code, at any time in your application:
最后，你可以在你应用的任何时间点通过一行代码加载动画。
First, create our Animation object:
首先，创建动画对象：
Here we want to scale an object on the X axis, so it will be “scaling.x”.
此处我们想在X轴方向上放大对象, 所以此处使用“scaling.x”。
Here you decide and enter what kind of value will be modified: is it a float (e.g. a translation), a vector (e.g. a direction), or a quaternion.
此处你决定开始修改什么类型的数据：floating（比如是平移），一个向量(比如是方向)，或四元数。
In our case, we want to scale our box, but not in a linear way: it must be faster when it became larger, and slower when it became thinner.
在我们这个案例，我们想放大盒子，但是不是线性方式，而是放大时盒子越大则放大的速度越快，缩小时盒子越小缩得越慢。
Much information is in the parameters:
更多信息在参数里：
Next, two important steps: * Adding the animation array to the animation object:
紧接着，最重要的两步： * 将存有动画信息的数组添加到动画对象上。
Now that we have our Animation object, it is time to say how those values will be modified.
现在我们已经有动画对象了，可以谈论如何修改那些值了。
Our goal: move this “box1”.
我们的目标是：移动这个"box1"。
So:
如此:
The animation is based on objects called Animation (!!).
基于众多物体对象动画也叫电影片段。
The first is to define a collection of keys and defining your object's situation at each key.
第一种方式是定义一系列的键值集合，并且定义好每个键值对应的对象物状态。
The second way is for more complex animations, when you change animation code at run time.
第二种方式可以定义更复杂的动画，在运行是改变动画代码。

The speed ratio of this animation optional | onAnimationEnd | () => void | The function triggered on the end of the animation (also dependent upon ANIMATIONLOOPMODE) optional | animatable | [Animatable](http://doc.babylonjs.com/classes/Animatable) | An optional specific animation ---
动画的速率 可选 | onAnimationEnd | () => void | 该函数在动画的结束被触发调用(同样取决于 ANIMATIONLOOPMODE) 可选 | 可播放 | [Animatable](http://doc.babylonjs.com/classes/Animatable) | 一个可选的特殊动画 ---
There are two primary ways of doing animations in your scene.
有两种主要的方式实现场景动画。
This can be any mesh property, depending upon what you want to change.
这个可以是网格的任何属性，取决于你要修改什么。
To achieve today’s animated scene, we begin by creating our environment:
未来实现今天的动态场景，我们开始创建自己的环境：
To put dynamics in it, we are going to learn how to tell your computer to move your meshes in any way you choose.
为了给它注入动态，我们将开始学习如何控制电脑来按照你指定的方式移动你创建的网格对象。
_Final result_
_最终结果_
```javascript animationBox.setKeys(keys); ``` * Link this animation to our box:
```javascript animationBox.setKeys(keys); ``` * 将动画和对象链接起来
| Name | Type | Description ---|---|---|---
| from | number | The fps starting frame
| 起始| 数 | 开始fps
| target | any | The target
| 目标 | 任意 | 特定目标
| to | number | The fps ending frame optional | loop | boolean | If true, the animation will loop (dependent upon BABYLON.Animation.ANIMATIONLOOPMODE) optional | speedRatio | number | default : 1.
| 止于 | 数量 | 结束fps 可选 | 循环 | 布尔值 | 如果为真,则动画循环播放 (取决于BABYLON.Animation.ANIMATIONLOOPMODE) 可选 | 速率 | 数值 | 默认 : 1.
